title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Most of the COVID-19 deaths in America are in blue states. Dr. Fauci talks to Fredo Cuomo every night. As Rush predicted, “heartless” Trump blamed for deaths from reopening. NYT story on leaked model projecting more deaths. UK Guardian on Trump's lack of compassion. NYT gets Pulitzer for phony 1619 project. Democrat governors under pressure to reopen. Everything the modelers have told us has been wrong. Axios frets people are losing fear of leaving home, poll finds Democrats worried, Republicans aren't. Everything is partisan. Trump to Make America Great Again Again. Cuomo gets no blame for New York nursing home disaster because he's a Democrat.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Partisan divide over a pandemic. More stories about "heartless" Trump. The real Donald Trump is the opposite of heartless, he cares deeply about people, believes nothing is impossible. How Trump postponed Rush's surgery to give him the Presidential Medal of Freedom. Democrats worried about what to do about Plugs. What went on between Trump and Brian Kemp. Michelle O blames black voters for Trump.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Michelle Obama blames "her folks", black voters for not turning out for Hillary, takes it as a personal slap in the face to her. Hillary wants to replace Plugs. Gavin Newsom caves, reopens California. Starbucks CEO to open 85% of stores this week, will adapt to new circumstances. Fauci pours cold water on every piece of good news. NY AG goes after NBC News. Effort to inflate COVID-19 deaths. Data shows you're far more likely to die of coronavirus in a blue state than a red state. Project Veritas talks to NY funeral home directors, who say COVID-19 deaths are being padded. Democrat governors want to slow down economic recovery.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
